author: GEOFF MULVIHILL
title: J&J, distributors finalize $26B landmark opioid settlement
description: CAMDEN, N.J. (AP) — Drugmaker Johnson & Johnson and three major distributors finalized nationwide settlements over their role in the opioid addiction crisis Friday, an announcement that clears the way for $26 billion to flow to nearly every state and loca…
